DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy ( defined complete clinical response 6 month ) imiquimod vs. standard treatment ( surgery ) vulvar intraepithelial neoplasia ( VIN ) .
DOC.brief_title: Primary Imiquimod Treatment Versus Surgery Vulvar Intraepithelial Neoplasia
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm VIN ( usual type , formerly VIN 23 ) Visible , measurable lesion ( ) Contraception ( premenopausal woman ) Evidence invasion History cancer severe inflammatory dermatosis vulva Pregnancy , lactation Immunodeficiency Any treatment VIN within previous three month Known hypersensitivity imiquimod
